segments.text: I think the girl looks so sweet, standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s not even trying to climb up there herself—she’s just trusting her brother to help her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, but he’s determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t drop the plate he’s holding—it would be such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice the water overflowing before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so chaotic, but the kids seem so happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how focused they are on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, but they don’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it—it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR
